remarks: Ordered pair membership in an ordered pair class abstraction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Nov-2015.)
statement:
brab2a.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
brab2a.2 $e |- R = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. C /\ y e. D ) /\ ph ) } $.
brab2a $p |- ( A R B <-> ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d ps x y $.
